amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Air Force Research, Development, Test and Evaluation funding for the airborne laser program by $55 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the amount for "Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force" by $55,000,000 from $275,500,000 to $220,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
